name: Web Hop
description:
Submission to Mini jam 123 - Web

----------------------------------------------------------

The sewers have been getting more and more dangerous, help Hoppy the spider escape the sewers for as long as possible. Try and get the highest score, brag to your friends about how stupid they are because they can't jump on the flies as many times as you can, and lose said friends if you had any, to begin with. The rewards are endless. 

Make sure to post your score in the comments! May the best spider win

---------------------

CONTROLS:

A, D - Move Left Right

Left Mouse - Shoot

----------------------
